# Usage
## Text-only based on data attribute
Simply set **data-tooltip** attribute to the content you wish to display inside the tooltip
## Full-featured dynamically generated
Call **Mntl.Tooltip.createDynamicTooltip(element, config)** for every **element** you wish to trigger a tooltip. **config** is a properties object containing the following: **config.contentFactory()** is a function returning the **HTMLElement** or **innerHTML** you wish to display inside the tooltip body. **config.tracking** is an object containing the tracking values you wish to overlay atop the default tooltip tracking values. **config.secondaryTriggerEl** is an additional element that will trigger the tooltip but in the context of **element** (so the tooltip will still point to **element**)
### Classes / Attributes
- **.mntl-dynamic-tooltip** the element wrapping the entirety of the tooltip
- **.mntl-dynamic-tooltip--content:before** the pseudo element for the carat displayed above the tooltip body
- **.mntl-dynamic-tooltip--content** the element that contains the body of the tooltip
- **.mntl-dynamic-tooltip--trigger** the element that triggers display of the tooltip
- **[data-inline-tooltip]** data attribute flagging inline level element that can cause tooltip trigger to wrap to multiple lines
### Examples
See [mantle-ref test page](https://www.mantle-ref-stable-us-east-1.external1.continual.app.qa.aws.about.com/tooltips)
